name: Intel E10G42BT 2 x 10 Gb/s Ethernet PCIe x8 Network Adapter
Features: [This 10 Gigabit X520-T2 Ethernet Server Adapter showcases Intel's third-generation standards-based 10GBASE-T adapter in a low profile PCI Express form factor., This new dual port adapter provides bandwidth-intensive applications highly affordable 10 Gigabit Ethernet (10GbE) network performance with cost-effective RJ-45 connections for distances up to 100 meters.]
